projects.description: Basic JavaScript syntax and data structures by building a Random Quote Generator, a program that displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button.

Data Pagination and Filtering: Displaying a large amount of data on a web page, like a list of 200 movie titles or 400 products, can overwhelm a user with too much information at once. A common solution is to create separate “pages” that each display a small portion of the data. In this project, display several “pages” of student data that the user can easily navigate and view.
Enhance a form so that it’s engaging, interactive, and easy to use. Form validation.

Create a browser-based, word guessing game: Phrase Hunter. Use JavaScript and OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) to select a random, hidden phrase. A player tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard.
Create an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API (Application Programming Interface).
